let ThreadTabController = class ThreadTabController {
    constructor(threadTabService) {
        this.threadTabService = threadTabService;
    }
    async createThread(req, createThreadReqDto, files) {
        const thread = await this.threadTabService.createThread(createThreadReqDto, req.user, files);
        return thread;
    }
    async getThreadsByAll(paginationOptions) {
        const userId = '';
        return await this.threadTabService.getThreadsByAll(paginationOptions, userId);
    }
    async getThreadsByPatternId(paginationOptions) {
        const threads = await this.threadTabService.getThreadsByPatternId(paginationOptions);
        return threads;
    }
};
